name: Infinite Tanks
description: Infinite Tanks features exactly what the name suggests â€“ huge content - never ending lines of modern combat vehicles, huge environments with realistic weather, online multiplayer and countless single player missions and drills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher Storage: 4000 MB available space Additional Notes: A video card with minimum OpenGL 3.2 driver is required.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 64bit Processor: Dual-Core 2.0 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher Storage: 4000 MB available space
